publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2749 Iain Gray: The Draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Amendment Order 2002—That the Social Justice Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Amendment Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*

S1M-2749 Iain Gray: The Draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Amendment Order 2002—That the Social Justice Committee recommends that the draft Civic Government (Scotland) Act 1982 (Licensing of Houses in Multiple Occupation) Amendment Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran
